tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AthletePerformanceMetrics (
  athlete_id INT,
  workout_date DATE,
  weight_lifted DECIMAL,
  reps_completed INT,
  time_taken TIME
);

CREATE TABLE WorkoutHistory (
    workout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    workout_date DATE,
    weight_lifted DECIMAL,
    reps_completed INT,
    time_taken TIME
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  workout_id INT,
  weight_lifted FLOAT,
  reps_completed INT,
  time_taken_min INT
);

CREATE TABLE WorkoutSessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    workout_type VARCHAR(50),
    total_reps INT,
    total_weight_lifted DECIMAL(10,2),
    total_time_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE AthleteWorkouts (
    athlete_id UUID,
    session_id UUID,
    exercise_id UUID,
    sets INT,
    reps INT,
    weight_lifted DECIMAL(10,2),
    time_taken_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE PersonalRecords (
    athlete_id UUID,
    exercise_id UUID,
    max_weight_lifted DECIMAL(10,2),
    max_reps_completed INT,
    max_time_minutes INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (athlete_id, exercise_id)
);
